John 14:6 NKJV
6 Jesus said to him, â€œI am (A)the way, (B)the truth, and (C)the life. (D)No one comes to the Father (E)except through Me.

*Did you know youâ€™re part of the ultimate statistics, 10 out of 10 people die. One day your heart will stop beating and you will be dead! The Bible says youâ€™ll then be judged by the holy and righteous God who created this universe.(Hebrew 9:27)Youâ€™ll be judged for every word, thought, and action in your life.(Matthew 12:36-37) Will you be innocent or guilty?

*Letâ€™s check the standard, the Ten Commandments. Have you ever lied (even a â€œwhiteâ€ lie)? (Revelation 21:8) Have you ever stolen anything (value is irrelevant and includes downloading or copying movies illegally)?  If youâ€™ve lusted, youâ€™ve committed adultery in your heart. (Matthew 5:27-30) (1 Corinthians 6:9-10)

If youâ€™ve hated someone, the Bible says youâ€™re a murderer(1 John 3:15). If youâ€™ve done any of these things, you will be guilty, and end up in Hell. God is perfect and He hates sin, but He sent His Son, Jesus Christ, to die on the Cross to take the punishment you deserve. Then He rose from the graves after three days  â€“ defeating death. (Luke 24:46-48)

Repent (turn from your sins) and trust in Jesus Christ our Lord and saviour  to receive forgiveness and everlasting life afterlife here on earth without pain, suffering and death anymore (revelation 21:4) God cannot Lie He is holy, Righteous and just cannot tolerate Sin(Hebrew 6:18) if you donâ€™t believe in God you are making God a liar. Think about it.

Do you think God cannot preserve His words ? He created the heaven and the earth and the sea all living things here on earth including human.

. Read the Bible to learn about God and how to live. (Acts 20:21) 

*Do Godâ€™s will, plan and purpose in your life; these are above and beyond, immeasurable compare to your grandest dream.

* We obey Godâ€™s moral law the Ten Commandments because we love our Lord and saviour Jesus Christ, the Father and the Holy Ghost(John 14:15) (John 14:1-6) (John 14:16-26) (Mark 12:30-31)  with all our heart, soul, mind and all our strength, and we believe and have faith in Him; also we Fear Him with reverence with deep respect. 

Job 28:28
King James Version
28 And unto man he said, Behold, the fear of the Lord, that is wisdom; and to depart from evil is understanding.

1 Corinthians 6:9-10
New King James Version
9 Do you not know that the unrighteous will not inherit the kingdom of God? Do not be deceived. (A)Neither fornicators, nor idolaters, nor adulterers, nor [a]homosexuals, nor [b]sodomites, 10 nor thieves, nor covetous, nor drunkards, nor revilers, nor extortioners will inherit the kingdom of God.

Ecclesiastes 12:13-14
New King James Version
13 Let us hear the conclusion of the whole matter:

(A)Fear God and keep His commandments,
For this is manâ€™s all.
14 For (B)God will bring every work into judgment,
Including every secret thing,
Whether good or evil.

* Letâ€™s seek the Lord and His face also His strength, power, wisdom and discernment in our daily lives.

We need Godâ€™s help to overcome Sin in our lives. And live a holy life in the eyes of the Living God. 

God will help us if we seek Him diligently with all our heart, soul, mind and all our strength .

Put on always the full armour of God (Ephesians 6:10-18)

Philippians 4:13
New King James Version
13 I can do all things (A)through [a]Christ who strengthens me.

Psalm 28:7
New King James Version
7 The Lord is (A)my strength and my shield;
My heart (B)trusted in Him, and I am helped;
Therefore my heart greatly rejoices,
And with my song I will praise Him.

Acts 20:21
King James Version
21 Testifying both to the Jews, and also to the Greeks, repentance toward God, and faith toward our Lord Jesus Christ.

God bless.


Living water.
Thomas Linda Jackson Jason Lewis Margaret

-Welcome, everybody. Welcome, welcome, welcome
to "The Tonight Show." You're here. You made it.
Thank you for watching at home. Well, guys, it's an exciting
time to be in New York City because over 140 world leaders just arrived here
for the UN General Assembly. -[ Cheers and applause ]
-Yeah. Yeah. If you love the sound
of car horns, police sirens, and New Yorkers
cursing at motorcades, this is the week for you! Yes! [ Cheers and applause ] Yep, due to heavy traffic, all New Yorkers
are being encouraged to take public transit. So instead of sitting
in a car that's not moving, now you can sit on a train
that's not moving, so... Well, New York City officials
actually said drivers should expect
the slowest traffic of the year. Yeah, you know, traffic is slow
when even Biden is like, "You know what? I'm just
gonna get out and walk." Uh... [ Laughter ] Yeah, earlier today,
President Biden attended the General Assembly and delivered
his final U.N. address. Biden called on nations to band
together amid world conflicts and growing concerns
over China's influence. Then he added,
"Or do whatever you want. What the hell do I care?
I don't... I don't care anymore." Biden's address was a big deal. It's the most important speech
he's delivered in front of a 1990s
kitchen backsplash. [ Laughter ] â™ªâ™ª That's a home-improvement
HGTV joke. Yeah. Some more political news. A new poll found
that 64% of people want to see another debate between Kamala Harris
and Donald Trump... while the other 36%
are Donald Trump. [ Laughter ] [ Applause ] [as Trump]
"I'm good. I'm totally good. No, thanks!" Yep, Harris agreed
to a second debate, but Trump's excuse
was that since early voting has already started,
it's too late. Well, it turns out Trump is
using a special excuse generator to help him
get out of these things. Let me show you how it works. When asked if he'd do a second
debate with Kamala Harris, Trump said... [ Beeping ] See? So...
It works like that. So then he tried another excuse.
He said... [ Beeping ] [ Laughter ] He got out of it. After that, Trump said... [ Beeping ] You know, that's... I mean, we need -- This is
the time of year to do it. Here's another one. He said... [ Beeping ] And finally, Trump said... [ Beeping ] And so he just has
a lot of excuses. He's busy. [ Applause ] Well, some news
from Washington today. The CEO of the company
that makes Ozempic testified before Congress, and he was grilled
over the drug's high price. Yeah, they were gonna roast him,
but grilling is healthier. [ Laughter ] â™ªâ™ª Some more business news. Southwest Airlines
told its staff that the company will have to
make "difficult decisions" to boost profits. Yeah, today the CEO walked
into the cockpit and said, "Sorry, guys.
It's your last day." And the pilots were like, "That's okay.
We don't work here." [ Laughter ] Well, listen to this.
I read that California is suing ExxonMobil
for allegedly not recycling
95% of their plastic waste. -Ooh.
-That just makes me sick. I mean, if you can't trust
a big oil company to protect the environment,
then who can you trust? You know what I'm saying?
Come on, man. [ Cheers and applause ] [ Chuckles ] Some entertainment news.
Kevin Costner just hinted that he might return
to "Yellowstone." -Ooh. Ohh!
-Yeah. Costner may have finally made up
with the show's creator. When they heard,
the United Nations was like, "Well, our work here is done.
Take care, everybody." Well, get this.
According to a new survey, two out of five Gen Z men don't
have a primary care doctor. Instead, they just create
the hashtag #DoesThisLookInfected. [ Laughter ] Well, this is wild. I saw
that a cream-cheese festival in New York just served
the world's largest cheesecake at 15,000 pounds. [ Audience oohs ] 15,000 pounds of cheesecake, which is almost as heavy as the
menu at the Cheesecake Factory. Almost. Finally, guys, it is Tuesday. It's time for "WePost."
Here we go! -â™ª WePost â™ª â™ª WePost â™ª -Welcome to "WePost." This is where we as a group
decide something we should post on socials. I'm going to show you
five different posts and we're all going to vote on whether you like
each one or not. You all have voting clickers
at your seats? Yeah, you see them? You can vote for all of them
if you want. You can vote for none of them. Whatever you want to do.
And we'll see the results live. Higgins, Roots, you guys
all have clickers, too. I'm going to post whichever one
gets the most likes from all of us -- because it's
not a MePost, it's a WePost. [ Audience awws ] [Voice breaking] Thank you.
[ Laughter ] Uh, you guys ready for this?
[ Audience cheers ] Alright. First post is... Everybody in the club
gettin' crispy. Yes. What do you think? It's a little crispy out there. Alright. The votes are in.
Let's see the results here. Alright. Not bad, not bad.
Very nice. You're being very nice.
I appreciate that. Thank you. Let's try this
next one here. It says... I don't care where I am as long
as I'm not involved with that. [ Laughter ] He looks like one of the --
He had to take his shoes off. -Yeah.
-He's gonna go for it. Yeah. -Sockless.
-Sockless. Control the volume with his --
Yeah, yeah. Let's see the results
on this one. Wow!
-Wow! â™ªâ™ª -That's it!
-That's off the charts! -That's actually off the chart.
-Oh, my gosh! 190! -Wow! That one hit home, man.
Yeah. Well done. -Wow.
-That's an all-time high. -That's an all-time high. Yeah. It's a Rita Coolidge
shout-out there. Yeah. [ Laughter ]
Alright. How about this next one here?
It says... -Deep cut! -I don't know if you're
gonna top that other one. I don't know if that's...
-That airline one was so good. I'm kind of riding
that all-time high there. Alright, let's see
the results on this one. I don't think so.
Yeah, yeah, yeah. Alright. Good.
At least we know -- At least we know these work.
Yeah. They're real. [ Laughter ] How about this one?
Next up, it says... -Hmm.
-[ Laughter ] -Think about it.
-I guess so. I don't know.
-Vaping maybe. Yeah. -I don't know. Vaping?
-No one looks hot -- No one looks cool vaping.
No one. -No one looks cool vaping?
-Yes. Salad, though... -No one looks hot
eating a salad. No one looks hot really eating.
-Yeah. -Well, except for, like...
-[ Cackles ] Smells like summer. -No, I was gonna say, like... I was gonna say Guy Fieri
or something. -Yeah.
-Those food people, they do it. They professionally, like,
chomp into something. -Yeah, they're
professional eaters. -They take their time.
-Joey Chestnut. -Joey Chestnut.
He doesn't even eat anything. He just swallows everything.
-No, he swallows, yeah. -Which one of those guys --
Joey -- One of the hot-dog guys,
he went vegan. -Kobayashi.
-Kobayashi. He doesn't even eat meat
anymore. -Yeah, he doesn't even
want to competitive -- He just wants to eat normal now. -Yeah. He wears that T-shirt.
-What is his T-shirt? -"No one looks hot
eating a hot dog." He does not.
-[ Laughter ] Alright. I don't have
a good feeling about this, but let's see the results
on this one here. Yeah, yeah, yeah, I agree. â™ªâ™ª Okay. This next one's not bad. -Okay.
-This one's got a chance. -Really?
-This one's got a chance
to beat the other. The other one's pretty good,
though. Everyone can relate
to that thing, sitting next to the weird person, yeah,
but this one's decent. Okay, here. This one says... [ Laughter ] -Whoa-oa-oa! -You go, "Hey, how's it going?
Whoa! Oh, my goodness. Sorry.
Wow. This is great. Where'd you get this thing?" Alright, let's see
the results on this one. Can it beat 190? I don't know. -Oh, my gosh! Oh!

We're going with number two. Number two

Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump has said that if reelected, he would imposeÂ new tariffs on China reaching 60 percentÂ of the goodsâ€™ value. After Trumpâ€™s tariffs aimed at China in early 2018, retaliation from the country and other nations affected hit the U.S. economy and especially agricultural producers hard.Â A report from the USDA showsÂ that between mid-2018 and the end of 2019, more than $27 billion, thereof $25.7 billion tied to China, had to be compensated with government payments to farmers. Tariff rates never exceeded 30 percent of goods value in that time period and were as low as 7.5 percent for some products, so an even higher and uniform tariff rate of 60 percent would be sure to send another shock wave through the U.S. business and farming communities.

By Hook Or By Crook

Most folks adhere to some form of moral standard. For some, this standard may be based on a religious or political belief. For others, this standard may simply be based on some form of acceptable social ethics. But some folksâ€™ standards are not based on religion or politics or any form of acceptable ethics. Some folksâ€™ moral standard is based on the adage, â€˜by hook or crook.â€™ Which means â€˜by any means necessary.â€™
This standard has been followed by pirates, gangsters, con artists, grifters, and thieves, of all stripes, since time immemorial. Those who follow it have been the bane of law-abiding, God-fearing, and morally upstanding people since people first formed into social groups. They have been feared, despised, hated, loved, admired, and emulated. They fill our police blotters, pulp fiction, action movies, and news broadcasts. They walk the streets of the hood, they haunt the halls of Congress, and they inhabit the boardrooms of big business. They may be your co-worker, next-door neighbor, or even a family member.
It is hard to say what kind of child, or when and how a child will pick up this standard of behavior. For some, it may be due to a form of trauma. For others, it may be due to how they are raised. For many, it is probably a combination of both. Donald Trump was raised by his father with this standard, and he, in turn, raised his children in the same way. His father taught him that the only thing that matters is winning and to win one has to be a killer. In other words, one has to win â€˜by hook or by crook.â€™
What does this mean? It means that all other standards of behavior, be they religious, political, or ethical in any socially acceptable way, are secondary. It implies that honesty, fairness, and compassion are seen as signs of weakness, while dishonesty, double-dealing, and cold-heartedness are seen as signs of strength.
In the world of the pirate, gangster, con artist, grifter, and thief, to outsmart, con, take, buffalo, hoodwink, or rip off the common citizen, mark, John, or sucker is not only a sign of success but confirmation of oneâ€™s superiority over the ordinary human being. Because at the core of a criminalâ€™s cynical rationalizations and justifications for doing what they do is a belief that the ordinary human being is stupid and the moral beliefs and standards of ordinary human beings are foolish. And so, ordinary human beings deserve what they get.
Donald Trump and his family carried these cynical rationalizations and justifications of the common criminal into their adult lives and the White House of the United States. And they succeeded, with the help of corrupt politicians, disgruntled Americans, and a foreign government, in pulling off one of the greatest political cons, economic heists, and social grifts in human history. The American People, the American economy, and the American political system were held hostage by a virtual gang of pirates who were busy ransacking the coffers of the American government and wrecking the American ship of state for as long as they could get away with it.
But finally, with the 2020 election, the American people woke up to what had happened, mustered all of the weapons the electoral system had to offer, and launched a full-frontal assault on these marauders that successfully drove them out of the White House.
But now, after the attack on our Capitol building by Trump supporters, the ending of Roe by Trump appointees to the Supreme Court, and with Trump running for the White House again, we must continue to resist, first by voting, then by continuing the Trump indictments. We must drive him and his sycophants out of government entirely because these pirates, gangsters, con artists, grifters, and thieves care nothing for the standards of our representative democracy that we value. They do not care about democracy and they have no business being involved in the management of our government. They will continue to ignore the rule of law and seek to satisfy their insatiable and prideful need to win â€˜by hook or by crookâ€™. And they will destroy our constitutional republic in the process if we let them. We must not let them.

JRB
